name: The Eyes Of Luigi
description:
!!NOW WITH MULTIPLE ENDINGS!!

Originally made in 2 weeks for Wizard Jam 2016

A comedy by Jon Coughlin
with art by Steven Frank and some code by Travis Hawks

Exposition

You are Luigi. You are looking for Mario in his bedroom. The door has locked behind you. There must be a key around here somewhere.

Controls

WASD to move
Mouse to look
LeftClick to interact with objects
RightClick to bring up your inventory

Guide

Most objects in Mario's bedroom have interactions - they may scroll text, they may pull up an inventory, but if you move your FOV close to them and they highlight, they do something.

You can add items to your inventory with the "Keep" button. You can equip items from your inventory with the "Equip" button.

Activate Luigi's Inventory with the RightMouse button.

Notes

The ghosts come out when it's dark.
Luigi can suck ghosts into his vacuum.
There is a key hidden somewhere.

- a lot of the jokes reference material from the Idle Thumbs podcast -

Dev Log: https://www.idlethumbs.net/forums/topic/10874-release-the-eyes-of-luigi/#entry402997
